name: CNN
text: "If the President of the United States knew that Covid-19 was worse than people thought -- and worse than he was letting on by comparing it to the seasonal flu -- why didn't HE go tell the American public about it?" writes @CillizzaCNN https://t.co/9EK0TANY3C

name: CNN
text: Would you take a coronavirus vaccine as soon as it’s released? Or do you have concerns? Tweet #CNNTownHall with the… https://t.co/mqmnoXkya0

name: CNN
text:
President Trump was asked directly on Thursday why he lied to the American people about the coronavirus pandemic.

The beginning of Trump's response: "I didn't lie."

That itself is a lie. https://t.co/YLR0ZfGk95
